# Chebikav
## Overview
**Community Size**: Large City
#Community-Size/Large-City

**Alignment**: Lawful Neutral
#Alignment/Lawful-Neutral

**Modifiers**: **Corruption** +1; **Crime** +2; **Economy** +5; **Law** +3; **Lore** +2, **Society** +1

**Qualities**: Insular, Prosperous, Racially Intolerant, Legendary Marketplace, Trading Post
#Settlement-Qualities/Insular #Settlement-Qualities/Prosperous #Settlement-Qualities/Racially-Intolerant #Settlement-Qualities/Legendary-Marketplace #Settlement-Qualities/Trading-Post

**Danger**: +5

## Description
**Government**: Autocracy
#Settlement-Government/Autocracy

**Population**: 15,900 (8,000 humans \[4,000 colonials,  5,000 Olman, 6,000 Touv], 500 halflings, 200 dwarves, 100 elves, 100 others)

## Notable NPCs
Baron Utilinus, Grand Custodian of Sargava (male human cleric of Aroden)

General Septimia Arodatus, Grand Praetor of Sargava, commander of the Sargavan Guard (female half-elf fighter)

Commander Ezio Egorius, Praetor of Eleder (male human paladin of Aroden)

Lady Madrona Daugustana, matriarch of Eleder (female human aristocrat)

Briga, owner of Sargava Club (female half-orc barbarian)

## Valuables
**Purchasing**: 16,000 gp up to 200,000 gp

**Spellcasting**: 8th

**Availability**: Minor Items: 4d4 items Medium Items: 3d4 items Major Items: 2d4 items
